episodes.title: 02 Michael: 25 Years in a Religious Cult
episodes.description: In this episode, Michael shares stories of what led him to join a religious cult and stay in the trenches for 25 years. We talk about the power of using fear as a manipulation tool, holding leaders accountable, and the power of love in overcoming shared trauma. Become a patron and gain access to exclusive content, early release episodes, and more at https://www.patreon.com/NexusofNarratives To learn more, support the podcast, and connect with others, visit https://www.nexusofnarratives.org For coaching and consulting services with me, reach out by visiting https://www.thenexusimpact.com Thank you to Sparta Media Group for producing this podcast!
